channel.title: Design Review on TooNormal
channel.description: Recent content in Design Review on TooNormal

item.title: Snakey Jake
item.description: An interesting concept for design people. I’m calling them clicking platformers. Everybody’s played Wik, so I wont talk about Wik. This is a game I came across today called Snakey Jake. Snakey Jake (YouTube Video) It’s your usual casual game fare as far as graphics and polish are concerned. What I was expecting was a “click on a spot” sort of game and he’ll move to that spot, but it’s actually click on the platform and he’ll move to the nearest place on the platform.
